room_title: Escape room "Remedy... 25 Years Later" by Adventure Rooms in Hartford
room_address: 282 Main Street Extension, Historic Sanseer Mill, Middletown, CT 06457
room_description: The remedy was hidden… as directed. 25 years later the Voice has instructed the Remedy to be moved. Your team is headed to a deserted town devastated by the nuclear catastrophe. Your mission is to get your hands in the Remedy. Let’s hope the Geiger counter readings are accurate!
